column5: Ready for Super Bowl! Three bedroom house for rent during Super Bowl week. Two bedrooms have queen beds and one bedroom has full size bed. Couch is comfy enough to sleep on as well! Kitchen includes Keurig along with all other appliances for your use. Our home is 28 miles from NRG Stadium, in the 'burbs and near NASA Space Center Houston and Kemah Boardwalk.
column8: Ready for Super Bowl! Near Kemah and Space Center
